title: Ticket #1593: More flexible user data for amazon ec2 jobs
description:
If both amazon_user_data and amazon_user_data_file are specified for an amazon ec2 job, the two blocks of data should be concatenated, with the data from amazon_user_data being first.

This is desired by CMS for GlideinWMS so that both binary data and the Condor job's job id can be encoded easily in the user data block.
remarks:
2010-Aug-20 13:31:06 by jfrey:
Pushed changes to master for 7.5.4.
